description: Transform KOKKOS from a static HTML site into a full interactive assessment platform with user accounts, email capture, interactive assessments, and analytics.

userStories.title: Initialize Next.js project with existing design system

Layout component with header and footer matching existing design

userStories.title: Convert static pages to Next.js routes
userStories.description: Migrate existing HTML pages (home, about, contact, assessments index) to Next.js pages while preserving all styling and content.

userStories.title: Set up Supabase project and database schema

userStories.title: Create authentication UI (signup/login pages)

Shows list of completed assessments (empty state for new users)

TypeScript types for questions and results

Calls onComplete callback with all answers

Prompt to create account if not logged in
